Class Position

java.lang.Object
Position
public final class Position
extends java.lang.Object
Immutable class. 2D vector with x and y coordinates. Position in the simulated world. (Commonly used to represent size of an area as well)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Position​(int x, int y)

    • add

      public Position add​(Position other)
      Sums this position with other position and returns result position (vector sum).
      Parameters:
      other - Position to sum this position with.
      Returns:
      Position vector sum of the two positions.

    • subtract

      public Position subtract​(Position other)
      Subtracts other Position from this position and return result position (vector subtraction).
      Parameters:
      other - Position to subtract from this position.
      Returns:
      Position vector sum of this position with inverted other position.

    • distance

      public double distance​(Position other)
      Calculates distance of this position from other position.
      Parameters:
      other - position, from which to calculate the distance.
      Returns:
      double - Euclidean distance of the two positions.

    • isInArea

      public boolean isInArea​(Position topLeft, Position size)
      Calculates if this position is inside the given area.
      Parameters:
      topLeft - top-left corner of the area.
      size - size of the area.
      Returns:
      true if position is inside area, false otherwise.

    • parsePosition

      public static Position parsePosition​(java.lang.String positionString)
      Creates a new Position object from formatted string
      Parameters:
      positionString - formatted string representing position
      Returns:
      Position loaded from the string.

    • randomPosition

      public static Position randomPosition​(Position max, java.util.Random random)
      Creates a random position in the area (0,0) to (max.X, max.Y)
      Parameters:
      max - limit to the random positions size
      random - random instance to use to generate the random move
      Returns:
      random Position in given range.
